title: Which champion to buy?
body: Hello! I'm wondering which champion to buy first. I'd like to buy Lulu, Diana, Nami, Thresh, Kled or Taliyah. Or maybe you'd like to suggest a different champion? I'm currently the best at playing as support, but I enjoy playing every role.

replies.body:
Yeah Taliyah is a bit hard to play.
Nami is a good choice.
